emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of three women, and three men, including groom Bruce G. Whitner and bride Jean Russell Whitner wearing loose fitting gown with upturned cuffs, and veil with large flower, standing behind three tiered wedding cake in Homewood AME Zion Church
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 30, 1967, pg. 16 reads: " Mrs Bruce Whitner...Charming bride - Harris photo." Portion of accompanying article reads: "Russell-Whitner Wedding Performed in Homewood - During a recent wedding at the Homewood AME Zion Church, charming Jean Russell and Bruce G. Whitner were united in holy matrimony. The Rev. George Fitch performed the double-ring ceremony...The bride is the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Eugene Russell of East Pittsburgh while the groom is the son of Mrs. Mayme Little and stepson of Williams Little of Pittsburgh..."
